title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4401.3 - Decision, directive or order of immediate necessity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4401.3 - Decision, directive or order of immediate necessity

State Regulations
A decision, directive or order, subject to an immediate
necessity that a decision, directive or order be issued, made, modified or
rescinded, may be so issued, modified, rescinded or made by the commission
subsequent to a telephonic or other informal communication among the members of
the commission. Any such decision, directive or order of immediate necessity
shall be issued thereafter in a manner prescribed by section
4401.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4401.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
